item.title: Akame Ga Kill
item.description: Overview Type: TV Episodes: 24 Status: Finished Airing Aired:Jul 7, 2014 to Dec 15, 2014 Premiered: Summer 2014 Broadcast: Mondays at 00:00 (JST) Producers: Square Enix, TOHO animation Licensors: Sentai Filmworks Studios: White Fox Source:Manga Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Shounen Duration: 23 min. per ep. Rating: R - 17+ (violence & profanity) [Source:MAL] Trailer MyAnimeList | Anilist | Fandom Synopsis Night Raid is the covert assassination branch of the Revolutionary Army, an uprising assembled to overthrow Prime Minister Honest, whose avarice and greed for power has led him to take advantage of the child emperor’s inexperience.

item.title: K-On

Rating: PG-13 - Teens 13 or older

item.title: Introduction
item.description: What Is Anime? Anime is hand-drawn and computer animation originating from Japan. In Japan and in Japanese, anime describes all animated works, regardless of style or origin. However, outside of Japan and in English, anime is colloquial for Japanese animation and refers specifically to animation produced in Japan. What Is Manga? Manga are comics or graphic novels originating from Japan. Most manga conform to a style developed in Japan in the late 19th century, and the form has a long prehistory in earlier Japanese art.
